my honest to god advice is just talk to girls. i get that its scary, i honestly do, but we're not gonna bite. if you go in with more than just the intention of wanting sex but actually talk to her for friendship and treat her right, then you'll be able to have meaningful relationships. whats the worst that can happen, they say no? if they reject you, you're losing someone who doesn't want you. they're losing someone who wants them. its their loss, not yours
